column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday December 18 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The ferry is back open.  It has been closed due to high water conditions.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
